item.title: Secure your linux VM in the cloud
item.description: 1. Enable auto update For manual apt update apt dist-update sudo apt install unattended-upgrades sudo dpkg-reconfigure –priority=low unattended-upgrades -> Yes 2. Limited User Account adduser prompt for password usermod -aG sudo 3. Password are for suckers auth key pair Give the publci key to the server Use the private key on the linux server : mkdir ~/.ssh && chmod 700 ~/.ssh on the machine : ssh-keygen -b 4096 scp ~/.ssh/id_rsa.pub mathieu@192.
